message.content:
cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.CV, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on using deep learning models to identify adult content producers in social live streaming services and analyzing the social graphs of these platforms to identify characterizing traits of adult content producers and consumers. This work involves aspects of multimedia (cs.MM) analysis, social network (cs.SOC) analysis, computer vision (cs.CV) for identifying adult content, and information retrieval (cs.IR) for crawling the social graphs. Additionally, the paper discusses the challenges of moderation systems in place, which could fall under the sub-category of social informatics (cs.SI).
